translations: 强求一致的；迫使就范的；残暴的

phrs.translation: [希腊神话]强求一致的政策；普罗克汝斯忒斯之床

sentences.sentence: We are firmly opposed to the policy of a Procrustean bed.
sentences.translation: 我们坚决反对强求一致的政策。

sentences.sentence: Yeah, I see. I'll not place all of them on Procrustean bed.
sentences.translation: 我知道。我不会对他们要求一致的。

sentences.sentence: Those strict proprieties of the old days are now regarded as a Procrustean bed.
sentences.translation: 那些老规矩现在被认为是普洛克·路斯·特斯之床。
